Name: Spirit Serpent's Swirl
Title: Floral Ring-Dancer: Spirit Serpent's Swirl
Desc: "...Even though all such gods and kings have now faded into the flowing sands, the memory of dance yet persists in the desert-dwellers' veins."
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Spirit Serpent's Swirl
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2703]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A2703] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S27032]</color> once.
When your <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2703]</color>, who has this card equipped, is on the field, when you switch your active character to one with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C127032]</color> equipped: Deal 1 $[K107]. (Once each Round)
(You must have $[A2703] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C127032.Name: Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent
C127032.Desc: $[K58]: $[S1270321]\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>\n(A character can only equip 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique at a time)

K58.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique</color>
K58.Desc: When the active character is equipped with a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique card, they can use the corresponding {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008} Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K107.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>
K107.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG
